attributes.action: make the Prime Minister address all petitions personally and not pass them on to an office trainee.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This website is pure window dressing verging on propaganda. The petitions you see here are a way of controlling disaffected and unhappy citizens by the  means of their appearing to be able to make a difference. When the huge number of petitions receive few votes, the petitioners become disillusioned and give up. By forcing the Prime Minister to personally address the petitions the British public can be assured that their efforts have not been completely wasted.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
